mapper.select: SELECT t3.FUserId as userId,t3.FUserName as userName,t3.FHumanName as humanName,t4.FDeptName as deptName,t1.code,t1.name,t1.id FROM trequestqueues t1 LEFT JOIN trequestqueuesdetl t2 ON t1.id =t2.queuesId LEFT JOIN tsysuser t3 ON t2.memberId = t3.FUserId LEFT JOIN tsysdept t4 ON t2.deptId = t4.FDeptId WHERE t1.id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trequestqueuesdetl WHERE queuesId=#{queuesId} and memberId=#{memberId}

SELECT t2.memberId as userId ,t3.FUserName as userName , t3.FHumanName as humanName,t4.FDeptName as deptName ,t4.FDeptId as deptId FROM trequestqueues t1 LEFT JOIN trequestqueuesdetl t2 on t1.id = t2.queuesId LEFT JOIN tsysuser t3 on t2.memberId = t3.FUserId LEFT JOIN tsysdept t4 on t2.deptId = t4.FDeptId WHERE t1.id = #{queuesId}
